Article.ArticleTitle: Exploration and local utilization of medicinal vegetation naturally grown in the Deusai plateau of Gilgit, Pakistan.

AbstractText: In the study area, the traditional knowledge regarding the uses of local wild medicinal plants for the health care of human and domestic animals is totally in hold of old people. The young ones are unaware about such an indispensable practices. The objective of the current study was to transfer this sort of precious knowledge from old members of the community to young generations in documented form.
